metadata.title: CVE-2016-6288 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The php_url_parse_ex function in ext/standard/url.c in PHP before 5.5.38allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read) orpossibly have unspecified other impact via vectors involving the smart_strdata type.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6288` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hhvm - 3.12.11+dfsg-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: hhvm package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.12.11+dfsg-1build1').
